languages.text: {n}Лицо Махария краснеет, желваки нервно поигрывают. Подавленная ярость отдается в словах легкой хрипотцой.{/n} "Я — верный слуга вашей династии и не мне оценивать спутников Вольного Торговца".

traits.locale_text: {n}Лицо Махария краснеет, жвалы на щеках нервно поигрывают. Подавленная ярость отдается в словах легкой хрипотцой.{/n} "Думаю, моя ретивость будет уместнее в других вопросах. Я — верный слуга вашей династии и не мне оценивать спутников Вольного Торговца".
traits.speaker: Zaurback

languages.text: {n}Sauerback's face turns red and he grits his teeth in agitation. Echoes of his bridled rage can be heard in the hoarse tone of his voice:{/n} "I am a loyal servant of your dynasty. It is not for me to judge the companions of the Rogue Trader."
languages.original_text: {n}Лицо Махария краснеет, желваки нервно поигрывают. Подавленная ярость отдается в словах легкой хрипотцой.{/n} "Я — верный слуга вашей династии и не мне оценивать спутников Вольного Торговца".

traits.locale_text: {n}Macharias's face turns red, he grits his teeth nervously. The echoes of his tamed rage can be heard in the hoarseness of his voice.{/n} "I am a loyal servant of your dynasty and I am not the one to judge the companions of the Rogue Trader."
traits.speaker: Zaurback

traits.locale_text: {n}Sauerback's face turns red and he grits his teeth in agitation. Echoes of his bridled rage can be heard in the hoarse tone of his voice:{/n} "I am a loyal servant of your dynasty. It is not for me to judge the companions of the Rogue Trader."
traits.speaker: Zaurback

languages.text: {n}ザウアーバックの顔が赤くなり、イライラして歯ぎしりを立てる。飲み込んだ怒りが喉で反響して声がしわがれている。{/n}「私は陛下の王朝に忠実な家臣です。自由開拓者の仲間の判断を疑う者ではありません」
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback's face turns red and he grits his teeth in agitation. Echoes of his bridled rage can be heard in the hoarse tone of his voice:{/n} "I am a loyal servant of your dynasty. It is not for me to judge the companions of the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}ザウアーバックの顔が赤くなり、イライラして歯ぎしりを立てる。飲み込んだ怒りが喉で反響して声がしわがれている。{/n}「私は陛下の王朝に忠実な家臣です。自由開拓者の仲間の判断を疑う者ではありません」
traits.speaker: Zaurback

languages.text: {n}苏尔贝克脸色通红，咬紧的牙关咯咯作响，沙哑的声音中透露出一丝压抑的愤怒。{/n}“我是王朝忠诚的仆人，我不敢妄自评判行商浪人的同伴。”
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback's face turns red and he grits his teeth in agitation. Echoes of his bridled rage can be heard in the hoarse tone of his voice:{/n} "I am a loyal servant of your dynasty. It is not for me to judge the companions of the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}马卡里乌斯脸色通红，咬紧的牙关咯咯作响，沙哑的声音中透露出一丝压抑的愤怒。{/n}“我是王朝忠诚的仆人，我不敢妄自评判行商浪人的同伴。”
traits.speaker: Zaurback

languages.text: {n}Sauerback s'empourpre et se met à grincer des dents. Même s'il fait des efforts visibles pour modérer son ton, sa voix demeure teintée de rage.{/n} « Je suis un fidèle serviteur de votre dynastie. Il ne me revient pas de juger les compagnons {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. »
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback's face turns red and he grits his teeth in agitation. Echoes of his bridled rage can be heard in the hoarse tone of his voice:{/n} "I am a loyal servant of your dynasty. It is not for me to judge the companions of the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}Macharius s'empourpre et se met à grincer des dents. Même s'il fait des efforts visibles pour modérer son ton, sa voix demeure teintée de rage.{/n} « Je suis un fidèle serviteur de votre dynastie. Il ne me revient pas de juger les compagnons {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. »
traits.speaker: Zaurback

languages.text: {n}El rostro de Sauerback se vuelve rojo y aprieta los dientes, tenso. En su voz se nota que intenta contener su rabia.{/n} «Soy un leal sirviente de su dinastía y no soy quién para juzgar a los compañeros {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente».
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback's face turns red and he grits his teeth in agitation. Echoes of his bridled rage can be heard in the hoarse tone of his voice:{/n} "I am a loyal servant of your dynasty. It is not for me to judge the companions of the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}Macharius se vuelve rojo y aprieta los dientes con nerviosismo. En su voz se nota que intenta contener su rabia.{/n} «Soy un leal sirviente de su dinastía y no soy quién para juzgar a los compañeros {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente».
traits.speaker: Zaurback

languages.text: {n}Sauerback färbt sich rot und knirscht aufgebracht mit den Zähnen. Die Echos seiner unterdrückten Wut sind in dem heiseren Ton seiner Stimme zu hören.{/n} "Ich bin ein treuer Diener Eurer Dynastie. Es steht mir nicht zu, über die Gefährten {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} zu urteilen."
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback's face turns red and he grits his teeth in agitation. Echoes of his bridled rage can be heard in the hoarse tone of his voice:{/n} "I am a loyal servant of your dynasty. It is not for me to judge the companions of the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}Macharius färbt sich rot und er beißt nervös die Zähne zusammen. Die Echos seiner gezähmten Wut sind in dem heiseren Ton seiner Stimme zu hören.{/n} "Ich bin ein treuer Diener Eurer Dynastie und nicht dafür zuständig, über die Gefährten {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} zu urteilen."
traits.speaker: Zaurback

languages.text: {n}İğrenerek dişlerini gıcırdatan Sauerback'in yüzü kızarıyor. Köpüren öfkesinin yankısı, boğuklaşan sesinde duyulmaya devam ediyor.{/n} "Hanedanlığınızın sadık hizmetkârıyım. Hür Tacir'in yoldaşlarını muhakeme etmek bana düşmez."
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback's face turns red and he grits his teeth in agitation. Echoes of his bridled rage can be heard in the hoarse tone of his voice:{/n} "I am a loyal servant of your dynasty. It is not for me to judge the companions of the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}İğrenerek dişlerini gıcırdatan Sauerback'in yüzü kızarıyor. Köpüren öfkesinin yankıları, sesinin boğukluğunda yankılanıyor.{/n} "Hanedanlığınızın sadık hizmetkârıyım. Hür Tacir'in yoldaşlarını muhakeme etmek bana düşmez."
traits.speaker: Zaurback
